name: market for railway track, for high-speed train | railway track, for high-speed train | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2606/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'railway track, for high-speed train', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is delivering the service of construction, maintenance and end-of-life of 1 meter*year railway track, for high-speed train. The process includes the construction of a ballastless rail track (track bedding, substructures, catenary system) as well as the construction of tunnels and bridges. It is assumed that the infrastructure has a life span of 100 years.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
